name: 心灵连线-心靈連線 -Angel Link -エンジェルリンク -엔젤 링크
name_original: 心灵连线-心靈連線 -Angel Link -エンジェルリンク -엔젤 링크
description:
Angel Link is a flash game with puzzle elements and simple and intuitive controls. The player suddenly finds himself in the world of the tavern and starts an adventure in this new world. Various events and battles will take place during the adventure. The game incorporates the elements of beautiful girls, and will accompany you on a leisurely adventure in the fantasy world. Plus, you can look forward to rewards for completing the game.

Game Features:
Beautiful girl + match 2 + endless challenges
Based on the match-3 puzzle game, we added an extreme challenge mode, which can be unlocked after completing the game. Interested players can test their limits in this mode. Each beautiful girl character also has unique content and CG artwork.
